item.title: Paper Recording
item.description: Neural Template: Topology-aware Reconstruction and Disentangled Generation of 3D Meshes (CVPR 2022) The training of the auto-encoding task for the continuous and discrete phases in total takes around 7 days on a cluster of eight RTX3090 GPUs, and the training of the image encoder takes around 12 hours.
